operation.name: insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO f_credit_refrerence_apply (form_id, project_code, project_name, company_name, address, busi_license_no, legal_persion, established_time, register_capital, busi_scope, busi_license_url, auth_url, afmg_approval_url, legal_persion_cert_front, legal_persion_cert_back, loan_card_front, loan_card_back, apply_man_id, apply_man_name, status, apply_status, is_three_in_one, org_code, local_tax_cert_no, tax_reg_certificate_no, social_unity_credit_code, loan_card_no, is_need_attach, attachment, raw_add_time) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

operation.name: update
operation.sql: UPDATE f_credit_refrerence_apply SET project_code=?, project_name=?, company_name=?, address=?, busi_license_no=?, legal_persion=?, established_time=?, register_capital=?, busi_scope=?, busi_license_url=?, auth_url=?, afmg_approval_url=?, legal_persion_cert_front=?, legal_persion_cert_back=?, loan_card_front=?, loan_card_back=?, apply_man_id=?, apply_man_name=?, status=?, credit_report=?, apply_status=?, is_three_in_one=?, org_code=?, local_tax_cert_no=?, tax_reg_certificate_no=?, social_unity_credit_code=?, loan_card_no=?, is_need_attach=?, attachment=? WHERE id=?

operation.name: updateByFormId
operation.sql: UPDATE f_credit_refrerence_apply SET project_code=?, project_name=?, company_name=?, address=?, busi_license_no=?, legal_persion=?, established_time=?, register_capital=?, busi_scope=?, busi_license_url=?, auth_url=?, afmg_approval_url=?, legal_persion_cert_front=?, legal_persion_cert_back=?, loan_card_front=?, loan_card_back=?, apply_man_id=?, apply_man_name=?, status=?, credit_report=?, apply_status=?, is_three_in_one=?, org_code=?, local_tax_cert_no=?, tax_reg_certificate_no=?, social_unity_credit_code=?, loan_card_no=?, is_need_attach=?, attachment=? WHERE form_id=?

operation.name: updateStatusById
operation.sql: update f_credit_refrerence_apply set status=? where id = ?

operation.name: updateCreditreportById
operation.sql: update f_credit_refrerence_apply set credit_report=? where id = ?

operation.name: updateApplystatusById
operation.sql: update f_credit_refrerence_apply set apply_status=? where id=?

operation.name: findByCondition
operation.sqlmap: SELECT * from f_credit_refrerence_apply where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.id" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> id = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.id# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.formId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> form_id = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.formId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_man_id = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.companyName" prepend=" and "> company_name like concat('%',#fCreditRefrerenceApply.companyName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.busiLicenseNo" prepend=" and "> busi_license_no = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.busiLicenseNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.status" prepend=" and "> status = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManName" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name like concat('%',#fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectCode" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectName" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name like concat('%',#fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> </dynamic> ORDER by id LIMIT #limitStart#,#pageSize#;

operation.name: findByConditionCount
operation.sqlmap: SELECT count(*) FROM f_credit_refrerence_apply where 1=1 <dynamic> <isGreaterThan property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.id" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> id = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.id# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.formId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> form_id = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.formId# </isGreaterThan> <isGreaterThan property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManId" compareValue="0" prepend=" and "> apply_man_id = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManId# </isGreaterThan> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.companyName" prepend=" and "> company_name like concat('%',#fCreditRefrerenceApply.companyName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.busiLicenseNo" prepend=" and "> busi_license_no = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.busiLicenseNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.status" prepend=" and "> status = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManName" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name like concat('%',#fCreditRefrerenceApply.applyManName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectCode" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name = #fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectCode# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectName" prepend=" and "> apply_man_name like concat('%',#fCreditRefrerenceApply.projectName#,'%') </isNotEmpty> </dynamic>
